Description: Hieratic papyrus with a Late Egyptian Miscellany, cols 15-17: 13.8-17.9 'Command to make preparations for Pharaoh's arrival'. Verso texts A-C; 'List of treasury scribes'; 'Phrases elsewhere attached to dates on papyri'; 'Letter about progress in decorating the royal palace'. Late Egyptian Miscellanies
Curator's comments: Miscellany Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies pp. Caminos Late Egyptian Miscellanies pp. Vernus, RdE 37, p. 144-145 [11, 4].
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380655) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380655)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: cockled, loss Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (cracked, warped) Window verso Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: B
